params.name: resume_from_checkpoint
params.description: If a str, local path to a saved checkpoint as saved by a previous instance of Trainer. If abool and equals True, load the last checkpoint in args.output_dir as saved by a previous instanceof Trainer. If present, training will resume from the model/optimizer/scheduler states loaded here.

params.name: trial
params.description: The trial run or the hyperparameter dictionary for hyperparameter search.

params.name: ignore_keys_for_eval
params.description: A list of keys in the output of your model (if it is a dictionary) that should be ignored whengathering predictions for evaluation during the training.

params.name: kwargs
params.description: Additional keyword arguments used to hide deprecated arguments
